title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 400.7 - Limitations on investments in certified capital companies by insurers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 400.7 - Limitations on investments in certified capital companies by insurers

State Regulations

Any investment of certified capital by an insurer in a certified capital company shall be subject to those provisions of article 14 of the Insurance Law which are applicable to the particular type of insurer making the investment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
400.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
